v.v: Hear my prayer, Yahweh; listen to my pleas.
Do not enter into judgment with your servant,
The enemy has pursued my soul;
My spirit is overwhelmed within me;
I call to mind the old days;
I spread my hands out to you;
Answer me quickly, Yahweh, because my spirit faints.
Let me hear your covenant faithfulness in the morning,
Rescue me from my enemies, Yahweh;
Teach me to do your will,
Yahweh, for your nameâ€™s sake, keep me alive;
In your covenant faithfulness cut off my enemies

v: Because of your faithfulness and righteousness, answer me!
for in your sight no one is righteous.
he has crushed me to the ground;
he has made me to live in darkness
like those who have been dead a long time.
my heart despairs.
I meditate on all your deeds;
I reflect on your accomplishments.
my soul thirsts for you in a parched land.
Do not hide your face from me,
or I will become like those who go down into the pit.
for I trust in you.
Show me the way where I should walk,
for I lift up my soul to you.
I flee to you to hide.
for you are my God.
May your good Spirit
lead me in the land of uprightness.
in your righteousness bring my soul out of trouble.
and destroy all the enemies of my life,
for I am your servant.
